name: Water Pulse
description: You send a wave of ultrasonic aquatic energy at a creature in range. Make a ranged attack roll, dealing 1d10 + MOVE water damage on a hit. On a natural attack roll of 17 or higher, the target is confused.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 5d4 at level 10, and 4d8 at level 17.

contest.effect: Makes the audience expect little of the other contestants.
